item.title: NOVEMBER 2020 Retirement and Investing Webinar ARCHIVE

Webinar Host

[/dfd_heading][dfd_new_team_member team_member_img_height="450" team_member_name="Evan Press, CFP®" team_member_job_position="Registered Financial Advisor and Past President, LA Chapter AAII" team_member_description="" icon_size="15" team_member_photo="12633" title_font_options="tag:div|font_size:24|line_height:40|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:div|font_size:16|color:%2334d288|line_height:24|font_style_bold:1"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

There will be Breakout Rooms to share your experiences and advice with Financial Fraud and Hiring a Financial Advisor.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color="blue"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1"]

Financial Fraud and Identity Theft

[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Financial Fraud and Identity Theft are serious scourges for all of society, but especially for seniors.  Fraudsters and Hackers target seniors.  How can you protect yourself?  Unfortunately, there is no 100% guaranteed way to do so.  But there is a lot that you can do to make it harder for fraudsters and hackers to steal your money.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20what%20to%20do%20now%2C%20before%20you%20are%20attacked%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20what%20to%20do%20when%20a%20credit%20card%20company%20notifies%20you%20that%20you%20just%20opened%20a%20new%20card%20and%20bought%20a%20big%20screen%20television%20while%20you%20were%20sleeping%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20what%20an%20Identity%20Theft%20Protection%20Company%20can%20and%20can%E2%80%99t%20do%20to%20protect%20you%22%7D%5D" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#45c168" icon_background="#ffffff" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2345c168"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_separator color="blue"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_heading subtitle="Who Will Work for You, Not Wall Street" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1"]

How to Hire a Financial Advisor

[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Hiring a Financial Advisor can be a difficult, or even scary, endeavor.  Even if you manage your own investments, you might once in a while want an outside opinion or help with an unfamiliar investment.  What should you look for when interviewing potential advisors?  Which kind is best – a traditional broker, a fee-only advisor, an advice-only advisor, or maybe a robo-advisor?  Do you need a CFP®?[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20the%20different%20types%20of%20advisors%20to%20choose%20from%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20how%20much%20you%20should%20pay%20for%20their%20advice%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20how%20to%20match%20an%20advisor%20to%20your%20investment%20philosophy%22%7D%5D" Questions? Evan Press  EvanLPress@gmail.com 818.613.0869

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1528420045018{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}" col_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" col_shadow_hover="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color="blue"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1604348729129{background-color: #d6f9f2 !important;}"]

During this period of the COVID-19 pandemic, you are encouraged

to consider making a contribution of $10 or $15 to support

the Los Angeles Chapter - AAII ongoing expenses.

To contribute you may (CLICK HERE). Thank You!

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
